trans-unit.source: Recognizes ink gestures.
trans-unit.target: Riconosce i movimenti di input penna.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> identifies an ink gesture.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> identifica il movimento di input penna.

trans-unit.source: You can set the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> to recognize all or a subset of application gestures.
trans-unit.target: È possibile impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> per riconoscere tutti o solo un sottoinsieme dei movimenti di applicazione.

trans-unit.source: To set the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> to recognize a subset of the available gestures, pass an <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> array to the constructor or use the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.SetEnabledGestures%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> per riconoscere un sottoinsieme dei movimenti disponibili, passare un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture> matrice al costruttore o utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.SetEnabledGestures%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: To determine whether a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> contains a gesture, call the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Recognize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Per determinare se un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> contiene un movimento, chiamare il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Recognize%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: XAML Text Usage
trans-unit.target: Utilizzo di testo XAML

trans-unit.source: You cannot use this class in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Non è possibile utilizzare questa classe nella [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to determine whether a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.ScratchOut> gesture.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come determinare se un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> è un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.ScratchOut> movimenti.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" />.

trans-unit.source: When it is created with this constructor, the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> recognizes all application gestures.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene creato con questo costruttore, il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> riconosce tutti i movimenti di applicazione.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture" /> that specifies the application gestures the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" /> will recognize.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di tipo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture" /> che specifica i movimenti dell'applicazione che l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" /> riconosce.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.%23ctor%2A> constructor to create a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> that recognizes a subset of the application gestures.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.%23ctor%2A> costruttore per creare un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> che riconosce un sottoinsieme dei movimenti dell'applicazione.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> that recognizes only the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.Down>, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.Right>, and <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.ScratchOut> gestures.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come creare un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> che riconosce solo il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.Down>, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.Right>, e <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.ScratchOut> i movimenti.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" />.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia tutte le risorse usate da <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" />.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Dispose%2A> when you finish using the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Dispose%2A> dopo avere utilizzato la <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Dispose%2A> lascia l'oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> in una condizione di inutilizzabilità.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, after calling <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Di conseguenza, dopo la chiamata <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Dispose%2A>, è necessario rilasciare tutti i riferimenti al <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> in modo che il garbage collector può recuperare la memoria che di <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> occupata.

trans-unit.source: Always call <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare sempre il metodo <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Dispose%2A> prima di rilasciare l'ultimo riferimento a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, le risorse utilizzate non verranno liberate finché il metodo <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> dell'oggetto `Finalize` non viene richiamato dal Garbage Collector.

trans-unit.source: Gets the gestures that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" /> recognizes.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene i movimenti riconosciuti dall'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" />.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture" /> that contains gestures the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" /> is set to recognize.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di tipo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture" /> che contiene i movimenti riconosciuti dall'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" /> per impostazione.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to get the application gestures that a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> recognizes.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come ottenere i movimenti dell'applicazione che un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> riconosce.

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean that indicates whether the gesture recognizer is available on the user's system.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un Booleano che indica se il sistema di riconoscimento del movimento sia o meno disponibile sul sistema dell'utente.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the recognition component is available; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se il componente di riconoscimento è disponibile; in caso contrario <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to determine whether the gesture recognizer is available before calling the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Recognize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come determinare se il gestore di riconoscimento è disponibile prima di chiamare il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Recognize%2A> metodo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" /> to search for gestures.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" /> in cui cercare i movimenti.

trans-unit.source: Looks for gestures in the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: Cerca i movimenti nell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult" /> that contains application gestures that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" /> recognized.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di tipo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult" /> che contiene i movimenti dell'applicazione riconosciuti dall'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" />.

trans-unit.source: The array returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Recognize%2A> method is sorted by the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: La matrice restituita dal <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Recognize%2A> metodo verrà ordinato i <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: For example, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Recognize%2A> may return a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult> array with the following values:
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Recognize%2A> può restituire un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult> matrice con i valori seguenti:

trans-unit.source: Index
trans-unit.target: Indice

trans-unit.source: ApplicationGesture
trans-unit.target: ApplicationGesture

trans-unit.source: RecognitionConfidence
trans-unit.target: RecognitionConfidence

trans-unit.source: This means that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> recognizes that it is very likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is a check mark, relatively likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> in not a gesture, and not at all likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is a curlicue or a double curlicue.
trans-unit.target: Ciò significa che il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> riconosce che è molto probabile che il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> è un segno di spunta, che il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> , non un movimento e non che il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> sia un ricciolo o un doppio ricciolo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Recognize%2A> method can return an array with <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.NoGesture> at a higher <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> than other application gestures.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer.Recognize%2A> metodo può restituire una matrice con <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.NoGesture> con una <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence> rispetto ad altri movimenti dell'applicazione.

trans-unit.source: This means that it is more likely that the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is not a gesture, as opposed to a gesture that has a lower <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>.
trans-unit.target: Ciò significa che è più probabile che il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> non è un movimento, anziché un movimento che ha un inferiore <xref:System.Windows.Ink.RecognitionConfidence>.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to determine whether a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> is a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.ScratchOut> gesture.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come determinare se un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.Stroke> è un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.ScratchOut> movimenti.

trans-unit.source: An array of type <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture" /> that specifies the application gestures you wish the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" /> to recognize.
trans-unit.target: Matrice di tipo <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture" /> che specifica i movimenti dell'applicazione che si desidera vengano riconosciuti dall'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" />.

trans-unit.source: Sets the application gestures that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" /> recognizes.
trans-unit.target: Imposta i movimenti dell'applicazione riconosciuti dall'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> that recognizes only the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.Down>, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.Right>, and <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.ScratchOut> gestures.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come creare un <xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer> che riconosce solo il <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.Down>, <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.Right>, e <xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture.ScratchOut> i movimenti.
